I want a pet!

# BITSY VERSION 3.4

POS 3 9,3

DLG 16
Go ahead and pick your new pet!

DLG a
I'm a cat

DLG h
A flamingo would be a very pretty pet

DLG i
A porcupine would make a dangerous pet

DLG j
A giraffe? I don't think it would fit in my house!

DLG l
I would love an elephant, but it would have to live outside.

DLG n
A goat! So cuuute!

DLG o
A jellyfish? Maybe...

DLG p
A little timid turtle. He is easily frightened.

DLG w
Have you thought carefully about your future pet? Enter the gate when you are ready to make your decision.

END 0
You now have a pet goat and she is so cuuute!

END 1
He's not the cuddliest pet, but he's still lots of fun!

END 2
You help your little turtle learn how to be brave. Now he's not timid anymore!

END 3
You and your fabulous new pink flamingo have many adventures together. 

END 4
You picked the jellyfish? Why...? Whatever, I guess it was your choice.

END 5
You and your new giraffe have lots of fun. You even build a treehouse together in your backyard!

END 6
You and your new elephant have lots of fun, even if he has to stay in your backyard.
